items.sentence: Using only a teaspoon, Tom dug the tunnel that he used to escape from prison.
Tom and Mary argued about how to spend the money they had won in the lottery.
I have two uncles. One lives in Australia and the other lives in New Zealand.
It's unlikely that anybody other than Tom would be interested in buying this.
In my opinion, Australia is one of the most beautiful countries in the world.
All you ever do is nitpick. I wish you could say something more constructive.
I'm not sure if you're interested, but I translated your article into French.
Tom became convinced that mining guano would be a lucrative business venture.
It's surprising that you haven't heard anything about what's going to happen.
How far are we going to keep going this direction before we admit we're lost?
